name: Roger PHILLIPS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, et. al., Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et. al., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Phillips v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Roger PHILLIPS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, et. al., Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et. al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of February, 2004, the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

843 A.2d 1222
